title: League client is not loading properly
body: everytime I try to play a game, it comes up as windowed, It will not sync to my screen, and changing resolution does not help this at all; in fact, it makes it worse because the mouseclick is far away from my actual mouse. this happened right after the latest patch. Any help would be appreciated, and I can record the screen showing what is happening if it helps at all.

replies.body: Update!  There may be a recent windows update issue that's messed up some resolution scaling.  You can try fixing this by right clicking the LoL icon, selecting properties, compatibility, and checking Disable Display Scaling on High DPI Settings.  Hope that helps!

Have you made any modifications to your game file at all?  There may be an issue with your configuration that's making your resolution all kinds of wonky.  As a first step, I'd like to try resetting your game configuration to a fresh slate:

First, log on then make a custom game. Alt+Tab out of the match, then navigate to your League installation folder, which should be in C:\Riot Games\League of Legends

Delete the folder named Config.

Once you've deleted the folder, leave the custom match. You'll then want to hop into another custom match to confirm the changes were saved.

Hopefully, that will get you fixed up!
